title: Configure a proxy for OO Workflow Designer
content:
You can configure a proxy for Operations Orchestration (OO) Workflow Designer in the Settings panel:

  1. Click the Settings icon in the upper top right corner of OO Workflow Designer.
  2. In the Connection tab, enable the Use Proxy option.
  3. Enter your connection details for Proxy Host and Port. The default port value is 8080.
  4. Click Proxy Authentication toggle switch to activate the Proxy User and Proxy Password fields.
  5. Enter your credentials, and then click Save to close the Settings dialog box.
